name: Caldwell - L'Escalade - Robusto
additionalNotes: The Caldwell L’Escalde is a medium-strength cigar that is handmade at the Tabacalera William Ventura in the Dominican Republic. Its Ecuadorian Habano wrapper covers a Dominican Republic binder and a filler made of tobaccos from the Dominican Republic and Nicaragua. This three-country blend offers up notes of spice and pepper.
